seng202.group6.model

Class FlightFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • seng202.group6.model.Filter<Flight>
      • seng202.group6.model.FlightFilter

  • public class FlightFilter
extends Filter<Flight>
    Flight filter class used to crate filters for flight lists

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> destinationAirport
      The HashSet of destination airport criteria that will be used in the match method to find Flights that match criteria.
      private java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> sourceAirport
      The HashSet of source airport criteria that will be used in the match method to find Flights that match criteria.

      Takes a flight object as a parameter and returns true if it meets the filter's criteria and false if it does not.
